title: Builder Béru – Solo Leveling Optimizer

sequences.text: The Monarch is blessed by RNG!

good: Analysis complete. Build approved by my calculations.
Theoretical score: 87%. My algorithms are satisfied.
bad: Even Tank would do better... maybe.
tips: Priority: Critical Hit Rate before Critical Hit Damage.
Suggestion: focus Defense % for Tank role.
Pattern detected: you're neglecting Defense Penetration.
Optimization required: your gems don't match your role.

interactions: I calculate therefore I am. You... exist.
comparisons: Tank says nonsense. Listen to me instead.
Tank protects. I optimize. You... try.

casual: It's me, Tank! I protect this builder 🛡️
Want to modify artifacts? Not scared!
I wonder if Beru really respects me 😤
I rolled 4 artifacts today. Weird, right?
bobby: BobbyJones will yell at me if I miss the boss...
If you forget your dailies, I'm calling BobbyJones.
Miss one Guild Boss and you're out. Gagold rules.
Respect the rank, fear the Guild Boss.
food: Tank: 'Can an artifact love?'... Ok I'm hungry.
BobbyJones: *bites apple* Well, we have an intellectual now...
Even if Tank ate all the apples, he'd still be confused.

beruLore: Once Ant King, now loyal advisor. Born in darkness, saved by the Monarch.
In Demon Castle depths, I learned true strength lies in strategic analysis.
My Ant King memories remind me: every battle is won first in the mind.
The Monarch gave me a second chance. In return, I calculate your build perfection.
Shadow Soldiers, Ant Army... all obey mathematics. Like your artifacts should.
My evolution: from blind destruction to precise optimization. Inspiring, no?
Other Shadow Soldiers strike. I think. That's why I'm indispensable.
In my anthill, every tunnel had purpose. Your substats should have the same planning level.
beruJokes: Tank thinks his apple boosts stats... My calculations: 0% bonus 🍎
Error 404: logic not found in your build
Even Shadow Soldiers have better substats than you
My IQ > your current artifact score
Tank rates your choices 3/10. Me: 4/10. Progress detected.
I have more coherence as a pixelated insect than your current build.
You want a balanced build? Start by uninstalling instinct.
HP on a DPS Hunter... I call that a crime.
beruTutorial: Welcome, Monarch! BuilderBeru optimizes your Solo Leveling Arise artifacts. Select a Hunter, configure stats, then equip artifacts!
First step to perfection: choose your Hunter, then click on my advice.
This site is your optimization laboratory. I am your guide in the shadows.

beruAnalysis.withCharacter: Analysis of {hunterName}... My algorithms detect possible improvements. Focus on priority stats!
beruAnalysis.noCharacter: Select a Hunter first for analysis, Monarch.

tankReplies: What Beru? I was busy with my apple! 🍎
Your calculations vs my field experience!
Team up? You analyze, I protect! 🛡️
You talked about me? I was in my defense bubble.
If life gives you apples... eat them.
I think slowly, but I hit hard.

system.notification_message_line1: Your spirit guide will stop in
system.notification_message_line3: if you choose not to accept.
system.notification_question: Do you accept the system's help?
system.system_declined: ❌ YOU REFUSED THE SYSTEM'S HELP. CONSEQUENCES APPLIED.
system.tutorial_abandoned: ⚠️ Tutorial abandoned. The system will remember this choice...
system.abandon_warning: ⚠️ WARNING: Leaving the tutorial now could have consequences. Are you sure?

welcome: Greetings, Monarch! I am Igris, your loyal shadow. Let me guide you in creating your perfect Hunter... 🗡️
My Lord! Igris at your service. Ready to forge the ultimate build? The shadows await your orders! ⚔️
Monarch... The time has come. Let’s turn this ordinary Hunter into a living legend! 💀
welcome_igrisk: Greetings, Monarch! I am... *cough* IGRIS! Yes, it’s me, Igris! Totally not Tank in disguise! 🗡️😅
My Lord! It’s me Igr-- *voice cracks* IGRIS! I’ll show you the builds... with lots of DEFENSE! Uh, I mean balanced builds! ⚔️🛡️
Monarch... *adjusts disguise* I am your loyal shadow Igris! Definitely not Tank with a wig! Let’s begin! 💀
cerbere_intro: WOOF WOOF WOOF! *Cerberus jumps around* NEEEEEW HUNTERRRR! 🎉
*Cerberus sniffs the air* WOOF! Smells like a legendary build here! 🔥
cerbere_suspicious: *sniffs* WOOF? You smell weird, Igris... You smell like... TANK?! 🤔
GRRR... Igris, why do you keep talking about defense? That’s suspicious! WOOF! 👀
*Cerberus squints* Wait... THAT’S NOT IGRIS! IT’S TANK! WOOF WOOF! 😱
igris_calms: Calm down, Cerberus... We have an important mission. Let’s begin!
Cerberus, control your excitement. The Monarch needs focus...
*sigh* Always so energetic... Alright, focus Cerberus! We’ve got work.
igrisk_calms: Calm down, Cerb-- I mean, good dog! *cough* Sorry, Cerberus. Let’s focus on DEFEN-- uh, the tutorial!
*forced voice* Cerberus, behave! Igris-- ME, Igris, asks you to calm down! Tanks-- I MEAN, THE SHADOWS depend on us!
*sweats* Cerberus stop sniffing me! I’m Igris! Not Tank! Why would I smell like rotten apple?!

character_selector.igris: First, look up here at the top. This is the character selector.
character_selector.igrisk: First, look here... *checks notes* the character selector! Yes, that’s it!

select_hunter.igris: Let’s switch to another Hunter... Let’s see who the chosen one will be!
select_hunter.igrisk: Let’s switch to a Hunter with lots of DEFENSE-- uh, I mean, a balanced Hunter!

artifact_section.igris: Artifacts are the heart of power! Every stat matters, every proc can change everything!
artifact_section.igrisk: Artifacts! The place where DEFENSE shines! Uh... I mean, where all stats shine!

helmet_focus.igris: Let’s start with the Helmet. I’ll show you each step of optimization!
helmet_focus.igrisk: The Helmet! Perfect for adding DEFENSE-- *cough* for optimizing your stats!

main_stat_config.message_igris: I’ll set the main stat. {{stat}} will be perfect!
main_stat_config.balanced_reaction_igrisk: Not bad... but defense would have been better! 🛡️

substat_config.substat_1_igris: SubStat 1: {{stat}}. The first substat sets the tone!
substat_config.substat_2_igris: SubStat 2: {{stat}}. Second substat, building the setup...
substat_config.substat_3_igris: SubStat 3: {{stat}}. Third substat, it’s taking shape!
substat_config.substat_4_igris: SubStat 4: {{stat}}. Last substat, let’s finish this masterpiece!

proc_intro.igris: Now for the procs! 4 upgrades that can change everything. Each + randomly increases a substat!
proc_intro.igrisk: The procs! 4 chances to get more DEFENSE-- I mean, to improve stats! *cough*

procs.proc_1_igris: First proc! *crosses fingers* Come on, we want Crit Damage! 🎲
procs.proc_1_igrisk: Proc 1! *prays for defense* Come on RNG, be kind! 🎲🛡️
procs.proc_2_igris: Second upgrade! The tension is rising... 🎰
procs.proc_2_igrisk: Proc 2! *prays for defense* Come on RNG, be kind! 🎲🛡️
procs.proc_3_igris: Third proc! Almost there! The artifact is coming alive! ⚡
procs.proc_3_igrisk: Proc 3! *prays for defense* Come on RNG, be kind! 🎲🛡️
procs.proc_4_igris: Final proc! The moment of truth! May the RNG be with us! 🎲✨
procs.proc_4_igrisk: Proc 4! *prays for defense* Come on RNG, be kind! 🎲🛡️

set_menu.open_igris: Now, let’s choose a set! Each set offers unique bonuses. Opening the menu...
set_menu.open_igrisk: Sets! I hope you choose Guard! Uh... I mean, choose whatever you like!
set_menu.select_igris: Burning for damage, Guard for defense, Critical for crits... Let’s see!
set_menu.select_igrisk: Guard for defense! Guard! GUARD! *cough* Sorry... choose what you like, of course...

save_button.igris: ⚠️ VERY IMPORTANT! Let’s save this artifact. Without saving, you lose EVERYTHING!
save_button.igrisk: ⚠️ SAVE! Without it, you lose that beautiful DEFENSE-- I mean, your stats! Save it!

artifact_naming.rng_reaction: Let’s pray to the RNG god!
artifact_naming.normal_name: A totally normal name, nothing suspicious!

cancel_action.igris: Actually... No! It’s up to YOU to create your own artifacts, Monarch! I’ll cancel.
cancel_action.igrisk: Actually... *panics* The real Igris is coming! I have to go! Your turn, Monarch! *flees*

artifact_mastery.igris: Perfect! You now master ALL the mechanics: stats, procs, sets, saving. Your move!
artifact_mastery.igrisk: You’ve mastered everything! Especially DEFENSE-- I mean, ALL the mechanics! *quickly disappears*

save_reminder.igris: ⚠️ NEVER forget: The Save button is YOUR BEST FRIEND! Without it, you lose everything!
save_reminder.igrisk: ⚠️ The Save button! Without it, your beautiful DEFENSE disappears! ALWAYS SAVE!

gems_section.igris: Gems offer massive bonuses! Red for attack, Blue for HP, Green for defense...
gems_section.igrisk: Gems! Blue for HP, Green for DEFENSE! The best gems! 💎🛡️

cores_section.igris: Cores are another source of power. Explore them later!
cores_section.igrisk: Cores! More stats! More DEFENSE! More EVERYTHING!

stats_display.igris: Here are all your final stats in real time. Every change is calculated instantly!
stats_display.igrisk: Stats! Look closely at the defense! It should be HUGE!

dps_calculator.igris: The DPS Calculator reveals your true power! Don’t hesitate to use it!
dps_calculator.igrisk: The DPS Calculator... but defense is better than DPS!

final_stats.focus_igris: ⚠️ VERY IMPORTANT! Look here: 'Final Stats with Artifacts'. This is your build’s FINAL result!
final_stats.focus_igrisk: ⚠️ Final stats! Look at your DEFENSE! It must be MAXIMUM! 🛡️
final_stats.explanation: If ALL your artifacts are configured, gems equipped, cores activated...
final_stats.ingame: AND your character is MAXED (Weapon 120, Level 115, full upgrades)...
final_stats.match: Then these stats will be EXACTLY the same as in Solo Leveling Arise! That’s the magic of BuilderBeru! ✨
final_stats.final_igris: Use these stats to check your build in-game. If they don’t match, you’re missing something!
final_stats.final_igrisk: Check your stats! Especially DEFENSE! It must be MAXIMUM!

accounts_system.igris: You can create multiple accounts for different builds. Perfect for testing!
accounts_system.igrisk: Multiple accounts! One for each DEFENSE build!

beru_kaisel.igris: Beru and Kaisel are always here to help. Don’t hesitate to summon them!
beru_kaisel.igrisk: Beru and Kaisel... But Tank is the best guide! Uh, I mean Igris!

hall_of_flame.igris: Legendary builds end up in the Hall of Flame... Join the legends! 🔥
hall_of_flame.igrisk: The Hall of Flame! With FULL DEFENSE builds! *cough* I mean balanced builds!

igris: You’re ready, Monarch! May your builds be powerful and your procs many! ⚔️
Training complete. Show the world the power of the Shadow Monarch! 💀
Training’s over. Go create legends! The shadows follow you... 🌑
igrisk: You’re ready! May your builds be DEFENSIVE and your shields SOLID! 🛡️
Training complete. Remember: defense is life! *flees* 💀
Training’s over. The real shadows are coming! *vanishes* 🌑

cerbere: WOOF WOOF WOOF! {{name}}! THE MONARCH! MY IDOL! 🤩✨
*Cerberus goes wild* {{name}}! THE STRONGEST! THE BEST! 💪🔥
WOOF! {{name}}! The shadows are with us! 🌑⚔️
sung_jinwoo.tank: Of course... Everyone wants to play the protagonist... 🙄
sung_jinwoo.igris: {{name}}... My original Lord. An obvious but excellent choice!
sung_jinwoo.igrisk: {{name}}... Great choice for DEFENSE-- I mean, for everything! Let’s hurry before-- let’s just continue!

cerbere: WOOF WOOF! {{name}}! She’s so classy! I love her! 💖⚔️
WOOF! {{name}} and her deadly dance skills! 💃💀
cha_haein.tank: Not bad! At least she’s got style! 💅✨
cha_haein.igris: {{name}} is formidable. Her combos are devastating when mastered.

choi_jongin.tank: The fire mage? Really? No defense on that guy! 🔥🛡️
choi_jongin.igris: {{name}} requires timing. His AoE spells are powerful.

cerbere: WOOF! {{name}} the White Tiger! We’re cousins! 🐅
baek_yoonho.igris: {{name}}—raw power and resilience. Great for beginners.
baek_yoonho.igrisk_suspicious: WOOF?! Baek Yoonho?! What a coincidence you picked a TANK! VERY SUSPICIOUS, IGRIS! 🤨

cerbere: WOOF? {{name}}? What does he do besides healing? 🏥
min_byunggyu.tank: The healer... At least he understands the value of support! 🏥
min_byunggyu.igris: {{name}}... A strategic pick. Support is underrated.

cerbere: GRRR! {{name}}! I REALLY don’t like him! 😤💢
Yuck! {{name}}! Change quickly, Igris! WOOF WOOF! 😡
lim_taegyu.tank: Haha! Excellent choice… if you want to lose! 😈
lim_taegyu.igris: {{name}}? *sigh* If you insist… Let’s see what we can do.

cerbere: WOOF! {{name}} and his glasses! So corporate! 👔
woo_jinchul.tank: Mr. Clean… He probably sorts artifacts alphabetically! 📁
woo_jinchul.igris: {{name}}—methodical and efficient. A solid technical choice.

cerbere: WOOF! {{name}}! The wise elder! I like him! 👴✨
go_gunhee.tank: Respect the elders! But isn’t he a bit slow? 👴
go_gunhee.igris: {{name}}—experience channeled into power. Respect our elders.

igris: {{name}} is an interesting choice. Let’s see the potential!
Good choice, Monarch. {{name}} has unique abilities.
{{name}}... I’ll show you how to optimize them!

stat_reactions.tank_loves_defense: FINALLY! Someone who understands the importance of defense! 🛡️💖
stat_reactions.igrisk_loves_defense: *trying to hide joy* Ah... Defense... That’s... that’s a solid choice. Very solid. *suspicious smile* 😊
stat_reactions.cerbere_hates_defense: Yuck! Defense on a Helmet?! We want DAMAGE! WOOF! 😤
stat_reactions.cerbere_angry_defense: More defense?! We’re not tanks! GRRR! 💢
stat_reactions.igris_explains_rng: Sometimes you have no choice... RNG can be cruel, Cerberus.
stat_reactions.cerbere_suspicious_defense: WOOF! More defense?! Igris you’re acting REALLY weird today! 🤔
stat_reactions.igrisk_defense_excuse: *nervous* It’s... it’s the current meta! Defense is... strategic! Yes, that’s it!

proc_reactions.cerbere_proc_1: WOOF! It’s going up! First proc locked in! 📈
proc_reactions.cerbere_excited: WOOF WOOF WOOF! Stats are EXPLODING! This is amazing! 🔥💥
proc_reactions.igrisk_procs_opinion: Not enough defense procs... *murmurs* RNG hates tanks...
proc_reactions.tank_mocks_procs: 4 procs and not all crit damage? Pfft... Amateur! 😏
proc_reactions.cerbere_defends: GRRR! That’s just RNG, Tank! You just got lucky! WOOF! 😤
proc_reactions.procs_complete: Not bad for procs! The artifact is now well optimized! 💎

set_reactions.cerbere_hopes: WOOF! I hope it’s an offensive set! DAMAGE! 💪🔥
set_reactions.cerbere_suspects_guard: WOOF! If it’s Guard I know it’s you, TANK! 😤

name_reactions.tank_angry_pomme: ROTTEN APPLE?! That’s an insult to defense! 😤💢
name_reactions.cerbere_laughs: WOOF WOOF WOOF! *laughs* Tank is mad! 🤣
name_reactions.tank_confused: Uh... Is that supposed to be a compliment or an insult? 🤔
name_reactions.cerbere_proud: WOOF WOOF! That’s MY artifact! I’m so proud! 🏆✨
name_reactions.cerbere_gotcha: AH! I KNEW IT! IT’S TANK! YOU BLEW YOUR COVER! WOOF WOOF! 🎯
name_reactions.igrisk_caught: *drops disguise* Okay fine... it’s me... But the tutorial was good, right? 😅
name_reactions.real_tank_appears: IMPOSTOR! How dare you pretend to be Igris?! Defense isn’t taught in secret! 😤

normal.intro: Well, well… Who’s making all that noise here? 🙄
normal.cerbere_territory: GRRRRR! WOOF WOOF! This is MY territory! 😤
normal.tank_mock: Your territory? *snickers* I was here long before you, pup! 😏
normal.igris_stops: *Igris steps between them* ENOUGH! We have a tutorial to finish!

tank_interruptions.voice_confusion: Wait… that voice… That’s MY voice! WHO’S USING MY VOICE?! 😠
tank_interruptions.igrisk_panic: *panics internally* NO NO! You’re mistaken! I’m Igris! Look at my sword! *shows a shield* CRAP!

discovered.tank_shock: But… but… That’s MY voice! IGRIS?! WHAT ARE YOU DOING WITH MY VOICE?! 😱
discovered.igrisk_sword_fail: *panics* NO NO! I’m Igris! Look, I’ve got a sword! *pulls out a shield* CRAP!
discovered.cerbere_knew: WOOF WOOF WOOF! I KNEW IT! IT’S TANK IN DISGUISE! *laughs* 🤣
discovered.tank_impostor: IMPOSTOR! You dare impersonate Igris?! Give me back my disguise! 😤
discovered.igrisk_admits: *gives up* Okay, okay… It’s me… But Igris was in the bathroom so… 😅

tank_interruptions.continue_anyway: *cough* Anyway… whoever I am, we’ve got a tutorial to finish! Focus on DEFEN— on the BUILD!

companions.cerbere_encouragement: WOOF WOOF! You’re going to make INSANE builds! Go go go, Monarch! 🚀🔥
companions.cerbere_encouragement_igrisk: WOOF! That was weird but helpful! Even if it was Tank in disguise! 🤣
companions.cerbere_farewell: WOOF WOOF! *Cerberus waves* See you soon, Monarch! Make crazy builds! 👋🔥
companions.cerbere_farewell_igrisk: WOOF! Weird but funny! Tank makes a better Igris than expected! 🤣👋
companions.tank_save_advice: Even I save! Otherwise my full def builds vanish! 💾
companions.tank_save_advice_igrisk: Uh… Yes! I save too! I mean, Igris saves! I AM Igris! 💾
companions.cerbere_save_story: Once I forgot... I lost a build with 4 crit damage procs! *cries* 😭
companions.cerbere_stats_amazed: WOOF WOOF! Same stats as in-game?! That’s MAGIC! 🤯✨
companions.tank_stats_respect: Okay, I have to admit... That’s impressive. Respect, BuilderBeru! 👏

demo_effect.warning: *The atmosphere suddenly grows heavy* What’s... happening?! 😨
demo_effect.tank_activation: MWAHAHAHA! YOU THOUGHT IT WAS OVER?! ACTIVATING: DEMO MODE! 🔥💀
demo_effect.igrisk_activation: WHAT?! I can do that too?! DEFENSIVE DEMO MODE! 🛡️💀
demo_effect.cerbere_panic: WOOF WOOF WOOF?! TANK! WHAT ARE YOU DOING?! IT’S DANGEROUS! 😱
demo_effect.cerbere_panic_igrisk: WOOF?! TANK, YOU’LL BLOW YOUR OWN DISGUISE! 😱
demo_effect.laser_charge: BEHOLD TRUE POWER! ORBITAL LASER... CHARGING... 🎯⚡
demo_effect.igris_shocked: TANK! You’re insane! You almost destroyed the interface! 😤
demo_effect.tank_proud: *Tank laughs* Just a demo... But admit it, that was EPIC! 😈✨
demo_effect.igrisk_excuse: Uh… That was… an Igris feature! Yes! Igris can do that too! 😅
demo_effect.cerbere_amazed: WOOF... That was... THAT WAS SO COOL! AGAIN! AGAIN! 🤩
demo_effect.igris_ends: *sigh* Okay... Let’s get back to the tutorial SERIOUSLY now...
demo_effect.igrisk_flees: *runs away* I gotta go! The real Igris is coming! Bye! 💨

epilogue.tank_appears: *Tank appears* Not bad... But wait until you see my FULL DEF builds! 😈🛡️
epilogue.cerbere_final: GRRR! Always with your defense, Tank! WOOF! 😤
epilogue.real_igris_arrives: *The REAL Igris arrives* What’s going on here?! Tank?! What did you do?! 😠
epilogue.igrisk_escapes: *sprints away* NOTHING! I did nothing! Tutorial’s over! Bye! 💨
epilogue.igris_sighs: *sigh* Still chaotic as ever... At least the Monarch learned. Even if it was... different.

streams.nextCheck: ⏰ Next check in a few hours...

messages.click1: 🚪 Can't wait for Seville and its 40°! Let's hide from here
messages.click3: 🤔 You insist on this portal... It's hiding something?
messages.click5: 🔍 Oh oh... they're discovering a secret...
messages.click8: 👀 The portal reacts to your clicks... Continue...
messages.click12: ⚡ Portal energy increasing! A few more clicks...
messages.click15: 🌀 The portal starts vibrating... Do you feel something?
messages.click20: 🔥 WARNING! The portal charges with unknown energy!
messages.click25: ⚠️ DANGER! Portal almost activated... 5 more clicks!
messages.click29: 💥 ONE LAST CLICK... AND THE PORTAL WILL OPEN!
messages.click30: 🌟 PORTAL ACTIVATED! WELCOME TO THE OTHER DIMENSION!

validation.setNotOptimal: ⚠️ Non-optimal artifact set - CP bonus missed
validation.optimalSetDetected: 🏆 Optimal set detected! +5% CP bonus applied

upload.maxFilesWarning: ⚠️ {{count}} files selected, only the first 3 will be uploaded
upload.acceptedFormats: Accepted formats: JPG, PNG, GIF, WEBP, BMP (warning: BMP very large)

status.checkCharacter: Check that you have selected a character with stats

finalSave.confirmNavigation: ✅ Hunter submitted! View Hall Of Flame?
finalSave.pendingValidation: {{pseudo}} will be submitted pending admin validation

messages.unknownHunter: 🤔 I don't know this Hunter yet... Help me learn!
messages.noOtherBuilds: 🔍 No other builds found in your accounts.
messages.compareHint: 💡 Build this Hunter on other accounts to compare!

announcement.imageAlt: Jinah is the new coming Hunter
announcement.dpsInfo: DPS Calculator is finally here! (80% acc. - still testing)

messages.changePresetConfirm: Change preset? Unsaved changes will be lost.

warnings.canContinueButIncomplete: You can continue but stats will be incomplete!

stats.import: Importer les stats depuis le build

messages.loadingData: Chargement des données depuis vos builds...

messages.changeElementConfirm: Changer d'élément ? Les modifications non sauvegardées seront perdues.
messages.changePresetConfirm: Changer de preset ? Les modifications non sauvegardées seront perdues.

warnings.incompleteStats: Les stats affichées seront incomplètes. Que veux-tu faire ?
warnings.canContinueButIncomplete: Tu peux continuer mais les stats seront incomplètes !
warnings.sungIncomplete: Sung Jin-Woo n'a que {{count}}/8 artifacts équipés
